specialRules.name: For the Hive!
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get Furious next time they charge. If they already had Furious, they get extra hits from Furious on unmodified rolls of 5-6 to hit instead.

specialRules.name: Poison Mist
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, roll one die. On a 4+ two enemy units within 6" take 1 hit with Blast(6) and Poison.

specialRules.name: Born for War
specialRules.description: For each unmodified roll of 6 to hit in melee, this model may roll +1 attack with that weapon. This rule doesn’t apply to newly generated attacks.

specialRules.name: Explode
specialRules.description: If this model is killed in melee, the attacking unit takes X hits. If this model survives melee, after both sides have finished attacking, it is immediately killed, and the enemy unit takes X hits.

specialRules.name: Exploding Spores
specialRules.description: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one extra wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Psy-Barrier
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die, and on a 6+ it is ignored. If the wound was from a spell, then it is ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: Spell Warden
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick one friendly Caster within 12", which gets +1 to its next spell casting roll.

specialRules.name: Pheromones
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one other friendly unit within 12", which may move by up to 6".

specialRules.name: Psychic Synapse
specialRules.description: Pick one model in this unit to have Caster(X), where X is the total number of models with this rule in this unit. If the model is killed, pick another to be the new caster, and transfer all spell tokens to it. The caster loses all unspent spell tokens at the end of the round.

specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model attacks in melee, you may pick one model in the unit as its target, and make 1 attack at Quality 2+ with AP(1) and Deadly(3), which is resolved as if it's a unit of 1.

specialRules.name: Corrosive
specialRules.description: Whenever this model takes a wound in melee, the attacker takes 1 hit.

specialRules.name: Regenerator
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +1 to Regeneration rolls next time it takes wounds.

specialRules.name: No Retreat
specialRules.description: Whenever a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to fully destroy it, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Shrouding Mist
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get Stealth next time they are shot at.

specialRules.name: Resistance
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die, and on a 6+ it is ignored. If the wound was from a spell, then it is ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: Spawn
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model is activated, you may place a new unit of X fully within 6" of it.

specialRules.name: Breath Attack
specialRules.description: Once per this model's activation, before attacking, roll one die. On a 2+ one enemy unit within 6" in line of sight takes 1 hit with Blast(3) and AP(1).

specialRules.name: Surprise Attack
specialRules.description: This model counts as having Ambush, and may be deployed up to 1" away from enemy units. Once deployed, roll X dice. For each 2+ one enemy unit within 3” takes 2 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as models in the target unit.

specialRules.name: Poison
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and the target must re-roll unmodified Defense rolls of 6 when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Caster
specialRules.description: Gets X spell tokens at the start of each round, but can’t hold more than 6 tokens at once. At any point before attacking, spend as many tokens as the spell’s value to try casting one or more spells (only one try per spell). Roll one die, on 4+ resolve the effect on a target in line of sight. Models within 18” in line of sight of the caster’s unit may spend any number of spell tokens at the same time before rolling, to give the caster +1/-1 to the roll per token.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds don’t carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit rolls when shooting at units where all models have this rule from over 9" away.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Spotter
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +6" range next time it shoots.

specialRules.name: Megaphone
specialRules.description: This model and its unit move +2" on Advance, and +4” on Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Cult Banner
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Flare Gun
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +2" on Advance and +4" on Rush/Charge next time it moves.

specialRules.name: Tactical Console
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one other friendly unit within 12", which may move by up to 6".

specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model attacks in melee, you may pick one model in the unit as its target, and make 1 attack at Quality 2+ with AP(1) and Deadly(3), which is resolved as if it's a unit of 1.

specialRules.name: Experiments
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one bonus to all models with this rule. On a 1-3 attacks get Rending, on a 4-6 attacks get AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Survey Vehicle
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 18". Next time a friendly unit shoots at it, it gets +1 to hit.

specialRules.name: Resistance
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die, and on a 6+ it is ignored. If the wound was from a spell, then it is ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: Warning Cry
specialRules.description: Enemy units  using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model.

specialRules.name: Agitator
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Furious. If they already had Furious, they get extra hits from Furious on unmodified rolls of 5-6 to hit instead.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds don’t carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.
